textBeforeTable: More Questions from This Game }); $(this).replaceWith(' Your Message:'); $('textarea[name="clarify_message"],input[name="clarify_submit"]').show(); $('input[name="clarify"]').click(function(){ $('textarea[name="clarify_message"],input[name="clarify_submit"]').hide(); } } voted[message_id] = 1; document.getElementById('m' + message_id).className = 'rating_on ' + type; document.getElementById(message_id + type).innerHTML = cur_vote + 1; ajax("/features/qna/vote.php", "vote=" + type + "&key=b99c2c9e&qid=347649&mid=" + message_id, no_response); { if(voted[message_id]!=1) { function vote(message_id, cur_vote, type) var voted = []; This question has been successfully answered and closed Just hop on the truck near by and hammer the hell out of them ...get to the top of the cab (not the bad of the truck) and the walkers wont hurt you. try to get in the middle of the cab to make sure they cant reach you..there will be alot of them to kill and it could take you a good 20 mins to kill them all (revover works great if you got the ammo) i killed atleast 50-70 walkers doing this trick. 2 years ago 0 0 dove218 answered: I climbed on the cab of a truck they cant reach you fired a shot crouched and meleed them to there wer only a few left and ran 2 years ago 1 1 Loki2169 answered: I simply lured them in and killed some of them. Then I ducked and
